item.title: Random Messages
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

So i logged into rs today when i was they now have random messages when you logged in so today i was going to show you two ways to make the ramdom Messages i know its easy but it is aimed at new players

So the first Way to do it is by the config people might wanna use this because they like puting stuff into config to keep everything neat and easy if you want or use the same message again for something els

Right so first go into [font=arial][size=14pt]Config.java[/size][/font] and add this code

public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE = "Welcome to Dragon Revenge"; public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE2 = "Welcome to Dragon Revenge have a good Time"; public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE3 = "Welcome To Dragon Revenge Happy Hollydays From the Dragon Revenge Team"; public static final String WELCOME_MESSAGE4 = "Welcome To Dragon Revenge Dubbe Drops Are now on";

Anywhere where you want in that file

Right so now go to [font=arial][size=14pt]Client.java[/size][/font]

add add this public String loginMsgs() { int loginMsgs = Misc.random(4); switch(loginMsgs) { case 0: return "+ Config.WELCOME_MESSAGE +"; case 1: return "+ Config.WELCOME_MESSAGE2 +"; case 2: return "+ Config.WELCOME_MESSAGE3 +"; case 3: return "+ Config.WELCOME_MESSAGE4 +"; } } Where ever you want

Lastly go and look for you welcome message and replace it whith sendMessage(loginMsgs());

[font=impact][size=18pt]Cratulations you have just added a ramdom message using config[/size][/font]

Right so The Benefit of this is that it does not take as much space up and is quicker to add

So in [font=arial][size=14pt]Client.java[/size][/font]

Add private String[] loginMessages = { "Welcome to Dragon Revenge", "Welcome To Dragon Revenge Happy Hollydays From the Dragon Revenge Team", "+ Welcome to Dragon Revenge have a good Time", "Welcome To Dragon Revenge Dubble Drops Are now on" };

Where ever you want

Right now go to your Welcome message and Replace it whith

[font=impact][size=18pt]Cratulations you have just added a ramdom message using All Client[/size][/font]

Thanks for using my Tutorial (If u did)

Like i said Dont be putting is is so easy and all that rubbish it was aimed at New Players

Read full topic
